attributes.action: Ensure proposed development of former King George IV pub site in Pinner, Middlesex, is in keeping with the character of our historical village.
attributes.additional_details: Please ensure that Harrow Council do not allow the current proposal for a characterless, charmless modern development to go ahead on the site of the former King George IV pub in  Marsh Road, Pinner.  We, the residents of Pinner, wish to see developments that are in keeping with the character of this historical Village, and preferably a tribute should be made to the 1889 pub that was demolished; for example a facade in keeping with the character of the previous pub.
